name: Drifting Memories
description:
Connect the people of your broken world.

Made by Justin and Christian during the Global Game Jam 2023 at the Leipzig (Germany) site.

How to Play:

Fly around with your gyrochopper and collect water and mirrors. 

Shoot the water towards an island you want to connect.

Place a mirror and adjust it to reflect light onto the seeds on another island.

Watch as a beautiful connection is made.

Keyboard Controls

K collect a resource

- Sink

+ Rise

Q Stop adjusting mirror

V shoot water

X Place mirror

W move forward / rotate mirror

S move backward / rotate mirror

A move left / rotate mirror

D move right / rotate mirror

cursor keys rotate camera

Gamepad Controls:

L, L1 Collect a resource

R2 Sink

R, R1 Rise

Dualshock Triangle, Xbox Y, Nintendo X Stop adjusting mirror

Dualshock Cross, Xbox A, Nintendo B shoot water

Dualshock Circle, Xbox B, Nintendo A place mirror

Left stick Up Move forward

Left stick Down Move backward

Left stick Left Move left

Left stick Right Move right

right stick Rotate camera

Cheats:

2 give mirror

1 give water

shift hold for turbo

7 gas chopper

8 old chopper

9 electric chopper

U Unlock electric gyrocopter

H trigger happy end
